Articles.Content:
I recovered a hulk from the Mun and when I switched to a different craft I could no longer return to the hulk as I no longer owned it.  This was extra infuriating as I set it on a entry trajectory with kerbin and had to launch a satellite to I could get close enough to switch back.  In addition I lost all of my current contracts.  My mods were

Kerbal alarms

TAC life support

 

Anyone seen something similar?

Anyone know how I can add 1.5 mil to my career persistence file (lost funds for concurrent contracts I was working)?

Edited January 24, 2016 by Nich
Edit you persistent save with a software like notepad ++ to recover funds, who knows what caused the bug

1 hour ago, Nich said:

This was extra infuriating as I set it on a entry trajectory with kerbin and had to launch a satellite to I could get close enough to switch back.

Use the tracking station...

1 hour ago, Nich said:

Anyone know how I can add 1.5 mil to my career persistence file (lost funds for concurrent contracts I was working)?

If you open up the debug menu via Alt-F12, then hold Alt for a couple of seconds, I believe it brings up a UI that lets you give yourself as much cash and science as you want.
